meanings.definition: To search for or collect items on a beach, especially after a storm.
meanings.sent1: Every weekend, we beachcomb for seashells along the shore.
meanings.sent2: She loves to beachcomb for treasures washed up by the waves.
meanings.sent3: The family decided to beachcomb for lost toys in the sand.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, they beachcombed the beach for hidden gems.
meanings.sent5: Children beachcomb for colorful rocks to add to their collection.

meanings.definition: A person who searches for or collects items on a beach, especially after a storm.
meanings.sent1: The beachcomb found a rare starfish during the morning walk.
meanings.sent2: As a dedicated beachcomb, she always carries a bag for her finds.
meanings.sent3: The little beachcomb proudly displayed their seashell collection.
